sentences.en: ...the only candidate who defeated an incumbent senator.
sentences.cn: …惟一击败了现任参议员的候选人。

sentences.en: A word of caution must be mentioned to the incumbent program manager.
sentences.cn: 对负有责任的规划管理人员来说,有一点是应加注意的.

sentences.en: He defeated the incumbent governor by a large plurality.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒多数票击败了现任州长.

sentences.en: He, as the incumbent, is vulnerable on this.
sentences.cn: 作为在职者, 他在这个问题上易受攻击.

sentences.en: In the June elections, Morris easily defeated the incumbent, Tom Smith.
sentences.cn: 在6月的大选中，莫里斯轻松击败了在任的汤姆·史密斯。

sentences.en: It is incumbent on [ upon ] you to answer his question.
sentences.cn: 你有 责任 回答他的问题.

sentences.en: It is incumbent on me to reclaim him.
sentences.cn: 劝他改过是我义不容辞的义务.

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all of us to make an extra effort.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都必须加倍努力。

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all users of this equipment to familiarize themselves with the safety procedure.
sentences.cn: 凡使用这种设备的人都应熟悉安全程序.

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon us to do so.
sentences.cn: 这样做是我们义不容辞的责任.

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon you to warn them.
It's incumbent on you to advise your son before he leaves home.
sentences.cn: 在你儿子离家前给他忠告是你义不容辞的事.

sentences.en: It's incumbent on you to warn them.
Luo trailed the winner, incumbent Legislator Chou Hsi - wei , by about 190, 000 votes.
sentences.cn: 罗, 落后于胜利者(任立法委员)锡玮, 十九万票.

sentences.en: The incumbent is responsible for all aspects of human resources for plant.
sentences.cn: 负责工厂所有人力资源和行政事务.

sentences.en: The incumbent will directly report to station Sales Manager.
sentences.cn: 此职位直接向分公司销售经理汇报.

sentences.en: The old man is an incumbent.
sentences.cn: 那位老人是一位教区牧师.

words.tran_cn: [管理]现任的；依靠的；负有职责的

trans.tran_cn: 在职的，义不容辞的，靠在[压在]上面的，弯垂下来的
在职者，教会中的任职者，〈英〉教区牧师
trans.tran_en: someone who has been elected to an official position, especially in politics, and who is doing that job at the present time
